page.title: 14Music at Sennen
page.content: On a recent Sunday evening the audience in Sennen Church found itself joining the performers in a lively and varied concert organised and directed by Gillian Earl. The programme included songs by Praet- orius,Morley and Vaughn Williams and instrumental soloists displayed impre- ssive talent. In the interval the audience was rehearsed in the intricacies of part singing and went on to give a perform- ance of Tallis' Canon which rang joyously round the granite pillars. Members of the audience expressed their appreciation partly by contrib- uting over seventy pounds to the church fund.
